body.name: Hello Fresh Mint Mouthwash Concentrate, Alcohol Free for Bad Breath, Travel Size Mouthwash Made with Coconut Oil and Tea Tree Oil, Helps Freshen Breath, 2 Pack, 3.25 Oz Pump Bottles
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 25 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Includes two (2) 3.25 oz. pump bottles of Hello Fresh Mint Concentrate Mouthwash, Travel Size Mouthwash for Bad Breath
1) Fill with water to fill line inside cap 2) Pump to customize your flavor experience: 1 pump = light, 2 pumps = medium, 3 pumps = strong 3) Swish for 30 seconds, spit, and smile
Less Plastic, More Fantastic. Contains 34% less plastic (compared to 16 oz. adult Hello mouthwash bottle dosed at 20 mL twice a day and using 2 pumps of concentrate twice a day)
92% less water shipped per bottle of concentrate (compared to a 16 FL OZ hello adult mouthwash bottle).
Travel Friendly. Vegan. No Alcohol. No Fluoride. No Dyes. No Sugar. No Artificial Sweeteners. No Artificial Flavors. No SLS/sulfates. No Brainer.
body.description: Less does more with Hello Fresh Mint Mouthwash Concentrate. Big and bulky mouthwash bottles are so last year. And the amount of plastic they use totally stinks. With our small, spitacular mouthwash concentrate, you get 34% less plastic* and 92% less water shipped per bottle of concentrate**. That means more doses for you.* This minty travel size mouthwash is more than a clever concentrate. It’ll also take your breath away—your bad breath, that is. The formula is made with a blend of farm-grown North American peppermint and Spearmint, so there’s delish in each swish. That blend helps freshen your breath and delivers natural menthol cooling. Plus, this alcohol free mouthwash helps rinse away the stuff brushing misses. And it moisturizes magnificently. With no dyes, SLS/sulfates, fluoride, sugar, artificial sweeteners or flavors, this bad breath mouthwash is a no brainer. Concentrate on the friendly with this travel-size bottle of Hello mouthwash for bad breath. *compared to a 16 FL OZ Hello adult mouthwash bottle dosed at 20 mL twice a day and using 2 pumps of concentrate twice a day **compared to a 16 FL OZ hello adult mouthwash bottle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect travel mouthwash. The taste is great and super easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s not overly minty but does the job and makes my mouth feel cleaner. I like the smaller size for storage and travel as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel
reviews.reviewText: This is great for trips where you don't want to or can't take a full size bottle. The taste is better than I thought it would be. You put just a little water in the cap and squirt 1-3 times from the bottle. That gets to be a challenge like any pump mechanism when you get to the bottom of the bottle. You can remove the pump at the end and just pour an estimate into the cap. The bottle meets TSA liquid size restrictions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great products. Works and tastes great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite Mouth Wash
reviews.reviewText: After using this product I have no idea why all mouthwashes haven’t just gone to the concentrate method. Works great and I can even pack for travel with ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: I bought this product after trying another mouthwash that I was not too fond of. I like it. It does the job. I'll definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Just why? They don't specify Antiseptic in this one. 1 bottle with 3 squirts per cap full equals 1 of their normal bottles full. Remember if you bought specifically for no fluoride, use distilled or reverse osmosis water. Filling with tap us just putting fluoride back in your body. Please make the origional germ killing brand available again. This has a much weaker taste. Doesn't matter the amount of squirts. It isn't the same.May be a travel gimic but no way for long term in home use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
